lessons.japanese: トムは医者としてすばらしい経歴の持ち主だ。
lessons.english: Tom has a bright career as a medical doctor.

lessons.japanese: ジャーナリストとしての彼の経歴は優れた実績でいっぱいだった。
lessons.english: His career as a journalist was full of distinguished achievements.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は素晴らしい経歴を持っている。
lessons.english: She has had a magnificent career.

lessons.japanese: 彼は自分の尊厳を守る為に、すばらしい経歴を犠牲にした。
lessons.english: He sacrificed his outstanding career to retain his dignity.

lessons.japanese: 彼はビジネスの経歴がある。
lessons.english: He has a background in business.

lessons.japanese: 彼の庶民的な経歴は前任者のそれと似ている。
lessons.english: His humble background parallels that of his predecessor.

lessons.japanese: 彼の経歴を会社に問い合わせた。
lessons.english: I referred to the company for his work record.

lessons.japanese: 彼の経歴を会社に問い合わせた。
lessons.english: I asked the company for his resume.

lessons.japanese: 彼の経歴は前任者のそれに匹敵する。
lessons.english: His background parallels that of his predecessor.

lessons.japanese: 彼のこの十年間の経歴には問題はない。
lessons.english: He has had a clean record for the past ten years.

lessons.japanese: 私は彼の経歴を疑わしいと思っている。
lessons.english: I think his job resume is questionable.

lessons.japanese: 警察は彼の過去と経歴を調べた。
lessons.english: The police looked into his past record.

lessons.japanese: 警察はその男の経歴を調べた。
lessons.english: The police looked into the records of the man.

lessons.japanese: 警察はあの人たちの経歴を調べているところだ。
lessons.english: The police are looking into the records of those people.
